summary: How Peter Parker Quit The Avengers and Became a Villian
title: How Peter Parker Quit The Avengers and Became a Villian
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2FqwXRT

by crazy_purple

Peter Parker had been craving fries all day.

So naturally he bought them.

Then this kid, Abe, started eating them.

Now Peter Parker is planning 37 ways to kill the fucker and get away with it.

Fucking Abe.

—————-

This is just me venting about my day through Peter Parker.

Words: 1406, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Michelle Jones & Peter Parker, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Crack, This is me just trying to vent, Peter Parker is a Little Shit, Tony Stark Is Done, Protective Peter Parker, over his food that is, this fic is stupid, have fun reading this, You may lose a few brain cells

blog.name: euteamo3000
blog.title: Pepper Potts, CEO of my heart
blog.description: 90s kid finally having her superhero phase 👊 This became mostly a Pepperony/Iron fam blog and I just 💁 (sideblog, follow as el-lugar-bueno)

title: Pepperony headcanon
body:
they never stablished they were dating.

After That Kiss on the roof they went on with their normal lives - bantering, bickering, looking out for each other, taking care of each other… the only changes were a few kisses here and there, and both of them got more touche-y with each other. That escalated to make-out sessions, sex, sleeping on the same bed (she totally owns a drawer at this point) more nights then not…

until Tony is sleep one night and he wakes up startled at 2am like

‘holy shit. I’m dating Pepper’

and that was it

summary: Sorry to be random, but I feel like I owe you with this information. Remember the CW scene when Tony goes out with the...
question: Sorry to be random, but I feel like I owe you with this information. Remember the CW scene when Tony goes out with the helicopter and tell Ross stg like "call me, I'll put you on a hold, I like to watch the line blinks"? Well, I'm from Hungary, and here the translation says "Call me, but be patient. I like when it vibrates for a bit." I laughed my ass off, and since this is the first time I think the translation fits the character better than the actual line,I felt like you would appreciate it:)
answer: omfg anon, i am in love with this piece of information, THANK YOU FOR SHARING THIS WITH US!!!! no wonder tony never called steve first in infinity war, he wanted steve to call so he could let the phone vibrate ~for a bit~

reblog.comment: omfg anon, i am in love with this piece of information, THANK YOU FOR SHARING THIS WITH US!!!! no wonder tony never called steve first in infinity war, he wanted steve to call so he could let the phone vibrate ~for a bit~

trail.content_raw: omfg anon, i am in love with this piece of information, THANK YOU FOR SHARING THIS WITH US!!!! no wonder tony never called steve first in infinity war, he wanted steve to call so he could let the phone vibrate ~for a bit~
trail.content: omfg anon, i am in love with this piece of information, THANK YOU FOR SHARING THIS WITH US!!!! no wonder tony never called steve first in infinity war, he wanted steve to call so he could let the phone vibrate ~for a bit~

summary: Because (I Could Not Stop for Death)
title: Because (I Could Not Stop for Death)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WYNOks

by seekrest

It had been a split-second decision, something that would later fill Peter with both regret and relief.

He can’t do this to his family, can’t play with their lives if he’s the reason behind all of this – if there’s even the slightest chance that it could be him.

In an instant, he decides.

Peter leaves.

Words: 6455, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Michelle Jones, Ned Leeds, May Parker (Spider-Man)

  • Additional Tags: Angst, Angst No Happy Ending, this is a sad one bois, felt only right considering the source, Medical Inaccuracies, Ambiguous/Open Ending

blog.name: ao3feed-stony
blog.title: Tony Stark/Steve Rogers
blog.description: stony ao3 fan fic rss feed

summary: I'm Breaking While You Fall Asleep
title: I'm Breaking While You Fall Asleep
body:
by LouCanFly

If he had suspected something was up with Steve before, now he’s practically confirmed it. This was not the Steve Rogers he knew before the war; this was a panicked, nervous version of him that Tony had never seen before, ever. Even in the worst, most terrifying situations, they look to Captain America to keep a cool head. So why is he suddenly this shaking, nervous guy who said “sorry” more times in the span of five seconds than Tony has in his entire life? How did Tony manage to turn Captain Freaking America into a nervous wreck with a stupid, self-deprecating joke? What the hell was going on with Steve Rogers?

Words: 10263, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America - All Media Types, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Falling In Love, Mental Health Issues, References to Depression, and ptsd, Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker is a Little Shit, he’s also a good bro, Depressed Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Oblivious Steve Rogers, what else do i tag, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Getting Together, Slow Burn, Love, Love Confessions, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Baggage, Implied Sexual Content, Anxiety, Undiagnosed Anxiety Disorder, I didnt realize that last one til I was done im so sorry


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/19309777

  • Additional Tags: Falling In Love, Mental Health Issues, References to Depression, and ptsd, Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Spoilers, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker is a Little Shit, he’s also a good bro, Depressed Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Oblivious Steve Rogers, what else do i tag, Fluff, Fluff and Angst, Getting Together, Slow Burn, Love, Love Confessions, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Baggage, Implied Sexual Content, Anxiety, Undiagnosed Anxiety Disorder, I didnt realize that last one til I was done im so sorry


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/19309777

trail.content_raw:
by LouCanFly

If he had suspected something was up with Steve before, now he’s practically confirmed it. This was not the Steve Rogers he knew before the war; this was a panicked, nervous version of him that Tony had never seen before, ever. Even in the worst, most terrifying situations, they look to Captain America to keep a cool head. So why is he suddenly this shaking, nervous guy who said “sorry” more times in the span of five seconds than Tony has in his entire life? How did Tony manage to turn Captain Freaking America into a nervous wreck with a stupid, self-deprecating joke? What the hell was going on with Steve Rogers?

body:
Ghost Tony

Tony bothering Pepper while she works. Turning out the light when Morgan works on a project too long. Putting a blanket on Peter when he falls asleep. Shooting Harley’s potato gun randomly. Tony being with them even though he’s dead.

Ao3: CapnShellhead

summary: Hear me out: I love these two moments because it reveals that both Steve and Tony were overwhelmed during the battle and putting...
caption: Hear me out: I love these two moments because it reveals that both Steve and Tony were overwhelmed during the battle and putting on a brave face anyway. Steve’s fighting a seemingly unkillable being. Tony’s pushing his armor to the limits and putting his faith in a godlike being everyone else thought was delusional. Both Steve and Tony were in over their heads but they both understood that the fight was more important.

blog.description: This is a collection of quotes from different fanfiction stories we've read over the years.  They're also recommendations, for it's rare that we find a story worth quoting without enjoying it in some way.

summary:
Captain Rogers—“ Coulson began. 
“I know, is a very special snowflake, and you want him to stop making paintings like he went to...
text:
Captain Rogers—“ Coulson began.
“I know, is a very special snowflake, and you want him to stop making paintings like he went to art school in the Upside Down.  Believe me, so do I.
